name: mdx.vim
description:
Syntax highlighting for MDX (OLAP queries)

If you want to add any improvements, please fork the file from:
http://github.com/findango/mdxdotvim
install_details:
Copy mdx.vim to your .vim/syntax/ or vimfiles/syntax/ directory
Edit your .vimrc or _vimrc file to set the syntax:

    autocmd BufRead,BufNewFile *.mdx set syntax=mdx
